oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WSM Variety Award Presentation - 1954-01-21 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program aimed at George Rosen of Variety magazine. Written by Bill Graham; engineered by Elmer Alley, Charles Bragg, Glen Snoddy, and Tom Sparkman; produced by Noel Digby. Part two of six.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Webb Pierce; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernie Keller and David Cobb talk about Sunday Down South -- David Cobb and Ernie Keller talk about commercial radio -- David Cobb talks about Nashville as a music city -- Ernie Keller reads from Nation's Business, Pathfinder, Coronet, American, New York Times, and Farm & Ranch magazines -- David Cobb and Ernie Keller talk about the Grand Ole Opry -- There Stands The Glass (excerpt) (Webb Pierce) -- David Cobb talks about Webb Pierce -- Walking The Floor Over You (excerpt) (Ernest Tubb) -- David Cobb talks about Ernest Tubb -- Ernie Keller and David Cobb talk about stars of the Grand Ole Opry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Cobb, David (Announcer); Keller, Ernie; Sunday down south (Radio program); Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984
